## Our Service

The API ("Service") provided at api.gptpersonalize.com is designed to simply
forward API requests to api-ninjas.com without collecting, storing, or
analyzing these requests.

**No Collection of Statistics:** We do not collect any statistics, logs, or
data analytics on the API requests made through our Service.
